channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Art Ninja
channel.desc: Ricky starts to receive countless gifts from a mystery superfan whilst coincidentally items begin to disappear from his flat. Gavin is instructed to keep watch, though he's a little distracted. Meanwhile, Ricky makes a shiny selfie in homage to Gustav Klimt, an octopus using a candle and a squirty flower! With his flat half empty, can Ricky finally recover his stuff and uncover his mystery fan.
